taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species univocus;

treatment.other_name: (of one voice; apparently meaning that everyone agrees)
treatment.description: Coarse, with erect primocanes but mostly depressed floricanes, the few setiform hard prickles scattered; primocane-leaves suggesting those of no. 129; lower long-petioled foliaceous bracts with simple or 3-foliolate broad and regularly serrate blades; corymb neither spiculose nor glandular.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Dry clearings, old fields and roadsides, N.B., s. Que. and Ont., s. to N.S., and se. Me.
